timeline.bodyText:
Say the PR will be merged at some Vespa x.y.z, at the LATEST.  x.y.z could be found by e.g. taking the current version (e.g. 7.324.14), and then add 4-5 to the minor version (7.330.1).
One must wait until all versions <x.y.z is gone from production.
It would be nice to document this version number with the tombstone default implementations below.
An alternative heuristic is to use timestamps, but then one would have to add a month or two to take into account long moratoriums, or even much longer when the major version is incremented.
